com.cmput301.classproject.Model
Class ApplicationCore

java.lang.Object
  Application
      com.cmput301.classproject.Model.ApplicationCore

public class ApplicationCore
extends Application

Represents the primary singleton for this application. Global accessible code is added here and other singletons are initialized here as well.
